attributes.action: Change titles to reflect gender equality and inclusivity
attributes.additional_details:
It is important that we continue to shift the rules of our society that were built on patriarchal and gender binary beliefs. 

A woman's marital status should no longer be advertised in her title, as it reflects a history of female repression and inequality. 

A person should also have the option to not be defined by one of two genders and to present themselves, reflective of who they are.
attributes.background: Change the titles 'Mr, Miss and Mrs' to 'Mr (Male), Ms (Female) and Mx (Non-binary/undefined)'

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Decisions on which titles people use are a matter for individuals. 

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580220
